sections.heading: Children's justice program; establishment, purpose
sections.text: 588-1.5 Coordination function. (a) The program shall promote the sharing of information among agencies providing services to the child and family, for purposes of implementing this chapter. (b) All agencies and their providers that have information

sections.heading: Coordination function. (a) The program shall promote the sharing of information among agencies providing services to the child and family, for purposes of implementing this chapter
sections.text: (b) All agencies and their providers that have information regarding the mental, physical health, or other information
